name: Jess - Cat Savior
description:
This is my heavily modified 2D Shooter Project. The project includes:

ART

  • Original new sprites
  • Original backgrounds
  • Original walls
  • Splash screen

MUSIC

  • Two original songs

CODING

  • collecting keys mechanic added
  • Each key collected removes a sealed door opening more area to explore

Credits: Created by Ben Faulk
